oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Impact of roughage on growth, health and behaviour in pigs and poultry
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vermeer, Herman M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
Animal husbandry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: * Need to supply roughage to grow-finish pigs (EC889-2008) * Expensive protein rich ingredients in concentrate * Many organic pig farmers have access to grassland * Some good practical experience with young grass (silage)
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Vermeer, Herman M. (2014) Impact of roughage on growth, health and behaviour in pigs and poultry. .
